09-02-2008, 07:28 AM #1 floridafinn Master Strategic Shopper Join Date Aug 2008 Location Palm Beach, Florida Posts 657 fast food/restaurant question I have a friend of mine that doesn't cook and loves fast food here is her suggestin from burger king to get a free whopper bogo buy a coffee for a 1.00 cal the number on the back of the receipt they give you a code and you can purchase free food
note: something I have done here, we have a restaurant called buds (fried chicken) go before 11am and you get a bucket of chicken (big) for 5.00
anyone else have any fast food restaurant tips I do use restaurants.com and the 40% from coupon mom was great
09-02-2008, 02:40 PM #2 paige Master Strategic Shopper Join Date Aug 2008 Location murfreesboro tn Posts 500
no but ill be watching!!! 09-02-2008, 03:18 PM #3 lizandsasa Master Strategic Shopper Join Date Aug 2008 Location Sunny California Posts 549
thnx for the tip - will be watching out at my local places for deals like these... With much Aloha and Blessings! Great group to join if you want to learn and share - click the link: http://forum.couponmom.com/groups/learn-share.html 09-02-2008, 10:03 PM #4 Maddy'sMom Strategic Shopper Join Date Aug 2008 Location Ohio Posts 95
Thanks for the tip, I'll be watching for this one! 09-03-2008, 04:36 PM #5 coupondad Master Strategic Shopper Join Date Aug 2008 Location New York Posts 540 wendys at our local wendys if you go in right when they are changing between breakfast and lunch (around 11 a.m.) you can get the breakfast items at 1/2 price... so the cinnamon bun which normally costs 2 dollars, cost 1 dollar... and if you sign up for wendys coupons... you can sometimes get it for free!
